alawwa pradeshaye di siduwu dumriya anathurin ek pudgalayeku miyagos thawath thisdenekuta adhika pirisak thuwala laba athi bawa wartha we. dumriya thunak gatimen mema anathura siduwa athi bawa dumriya salasum adhyaksha wijaya samarasinha mahatha sandahan kaleya. anathurin thuwala labuwan thawaduratath rohal gatha karamin sitina bawa ohu pawasuweya. me athara siddhiya sambandhayen parikshana pawathwima sandaha prawahana amathya kumara welgama mahatha wisin wishesha kamituwak da pathkara thibe. miyagiya pudgalayage mala sirura alawwa rohala wetha genawith thibena bawa ema rohal prakashakayeku sandahan kaleya. barapathala thaththwaye pasuwana thuwalakaruwan kurunagala rohala wetha maru kara yawimata katayuthu kara athi bawa da hethema pawasuweya.

eda sithala dawasak.punchi hiripodayakuth thibuna.eeth mama eda siyath ekka awidinna giya.api giye wiktoriya udyanayata.nuwara eliye sithala hulanga wadila, wiktoriya uyana haraha galayana diyapara udin dama thibunu yakada palame athwata sithala wela thibuna.api hitiye athwatata heththu wela.midumakin mulu uyanama wahila thibuna.witin wite miduma thuran wela uyane wawala thibunu rosa pata mal penuna.eeth sulu welawakata witharayi.
